lore: It would take thousands of years for Brownies to reintegrate into human cities. However, they no longer clean or cook for others, and they rely solely on themselves. Although most of them have normal jobs in the city, some others, like the Brownie Trickster, are involved in illegal activities such as robbery and smuggling. They like to enter dens of ill repute and hit drunkards on their feet to make them think it was someone else, starting a tavern brawl.
menagerieDialog: Could we slow down a little, buddy?
I'M GONNA BASH THEIR BRAINS IN!\n\n(Its threats would seem a lot more promising if this creature's voice wasn't so high-pitched.)
I like to think of myself as the leader of our group. Don't worry - you're my second in command!
(Both its weapon and its temper are comically oversized for its body.)
name: Brownie Trickster
